date.title: Transaction Date
date.description: The date the transaction took place.

payorId.title: Payor ID
payorId.description: Identifier for the payor in the transaction.

payeeId.title: Payee ID
payeeId.description: Identifier for the payee in the transaction.

categoryId.title: Category ID
categoryId.description: Category identifier for organizing the transaction. Can be null if not categorized.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction in minor units (cents). For example, $100.50 would be represented as 10050.

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the transaction.

transactionState.title: Transaction State
transactionState.description: The current state of the transaction.

entryType.title: Entry Type
entryType.description: Indicates whether this transaction represents a debit or credit entry in double-entry accounting.
